channel.title: NMM on Ꮅ̣
channel.description: Recent content in NMM on Ꮅ̣

item.description: I can’t remember who originally shared the tip, but if you struggle (like me) to get your non-metallics to actually look ‘shiny’, you can take a photo of your initial light placement on the mini and just boost the contrast to max and brightness to min. Try to match what you see with paint.
